PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-04802010-04-22,  ,  ,  AAFC,  , 
ActHealth of Animals Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Health of Animals Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the HEALTH OF ANIMALS REGULATIONS to add the serotypes of bluetongue considered endemic in the United States to the immediately notifiable diseases list so that international reporting obligations for bluetongue to the World Organization for Animal Health (OIE) are maintained while a concurrent amendment will remove them from the reportable diseases list.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0086 Publication Date: 2010-05-12
AttachmentsAttachment
